title: Williams makes it clear he wanted to be a Bear
description: Bears quarterback Caleb Williams on Wednesday defended his commitment to the organization that drafted him with the No. 1 pick in 2024.
author: Courtney Cronin

title: Vrabel stresses decision-making amid Diggs video
description: The Patriots are aware of the video in which Stefon Diggs flashed an unidentified pink substance while surrounded by three women on a boat, coach Mike Vrabel said Wednesday.
author: Mike Reiss

title: Widely mocked, wildly celebrated - how Chelsea won the Conference League
description: Wholesale changes and 7,000-mile round trips - BBC Sport tells the story of how Chelsea won the Conference League.

title: Raducanu 'not demotivated' by another heavy Swiatek defeat
description: Emma Raducanu's miserable record against Iga Swiatek continues as the defending champion dominates their French Open second-round match.

title: Maresca: I expected slow Chelsea start - but hope this can begin something
description: Enzo Maresca put Chelsea's slow start in their ultimately victorious Conference League final down to the mental efforts his side had put into securing Champions League football 72 hours earlier.

title: Littler rules out early retirement: 'I'll be here for a long time!'
description: Luke Littler, perhaps to the dismay of his close rivals, downplayed retirement talk as he set his sights on adding longevity to his supremacy at the top of darts.

title: Karl-Anthony Towns injury update: Knicks center questionable for Game 5
description: New York faces an elimination game at MSG on Thursday. The Knicks also face the possibility center Karl-Anthony Towns won't play.

title: Sky to retire jersey of Candace Parker, who helped lead Chicago to title in 1 of her 2 seasons with the team
description: Parker will also have her jersey retired by the Sparks this summer.
author: Jason Owens
